content: Now that you've defeated Erlang and the Four Heavenly Kings, you'll be able to see the secret ending of the game. To see the secret (true) ending, complete Chapter 6 as normal and defeat the final bosses to watch it  out.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_3_Secret-Mount_Mei_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 3 Secret - Mount Mei Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Mei-Jian Peak' and the sub-subsection 'Erlang Shen'.
The content is as follows:
Now that you've defeated Erlang and the Four Heavenly Kings, you'll be able to see the secret ending of the game. To see the secret (true) ending, complete Chapter 6 as normal and defeat the final bosses to watch it  out.
